b: when told extend then become 2 in 0.2s, play lightsword on
when told retract then become 1 in 0.2s, play lightsword off
when high speed then play lightsword swing 3
when touched then play lightsword hit 5
when triggered then tell extend, become 2 in 0.2s
when triggered then tell retract, become 1 in 0.2s
